label: AB6C2D_hR20_166_ab_2h_2c_c-001
title: High Temperature K$_{2}$LiAlF$_{6}$ Structure
comments:
This is the high temperature phase of K$_{2}$LiAlF$_{6}$, stable above 650$^{\circ}$C (Tressaud, 1984).  The low-temperature structure is hexagonal, but its exact space group is uncertain. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
